Author: kittypandaprincess
Text: Relatable! I'm on meds that made me gain and even tho I restrict and hardly ever binge I can think about a Coke and gain.

Author: CeslieLondon
Text: Dude yes. This, but I can’t imagine it with PCOS so bless you and your strength. My parents have both gained weight in their older years. My dad has drank 1 coke a day since I was born basically. He cut it out - dropped like 20lbs. Doing NOTHING else different. My mom, a healthy angel, eats literally 1 80 cal yogurt per day and a normal dinner. Gained about 15lbs. Probably just from THINKING about a cookie. It’s so hard. I have my own issues too. You’re not alone. I wish it was that easy too. I’m hungry. The scale isn’t moving.
